<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 8"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Read Disaster](/Feats.aspx?ID=6067) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Exploration" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=595" />
<trait label="Oracle" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=817" />
<trait label="Prediction" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=674" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Player Core 2](/Sources.aspx?ID=227) pg. 141 <sup>1.1</sup>

**Archetype** [Time Mage](/Archetypes.aspx?ID=191) (Level 10)

</column>

---

You spend 10 minutes and open yourself to the [divine](/Traits.aspx?ID=579) mysteries of the world, peering into the most sinister portents of the future. You gain the effects of [_augury_](/Spells.aspx?ID=1445), except you learn only about the dangers ahead; any results of “good” are instead “nothing,” and results of “mixed” are instead “bad.” If you are legendary in [Religion](/Skills.aspx?ID=46), you take only 1 minute to [Read Disaster](/Feats.aspx?ID=1496).
name: Read Disaster
